title: Foundations of Macro Tracking
summary: Learn macros, portions, and simple logging for real life.

lessons.title: Welcome & Big Picture
lessons.content:
### What you’ll learn
- Why macros matter
- Proteins, fats, carbs
- How to track without obsession

lessons.title: Protein Basics
lessons.content:
### Targets
A simple rule of thumb is 0.7–1.0g per lb of goal bodyweight. Pair with fiber.
